about_the_game:
Description


Francesco, the boss of a big Mafia Clan, has ordered three of his prostitutes to report the performance leaves much to be desired. Since Francesco is known as brutal, Marion, Eliza and Isabelle have a very bad feeling about the matter. "Blood, Sweat, and Lions" is a dark visual novel that allows players to experience a gripping narrative.
Embark on an exhilarating and ambitious adventure set in a world of crime, intrigue, and survival. "Blood, Sweat, and Lions" presents an incredible story where three women find themselves at the heart of the underworld. In addition to the involuntary actors, the main actors are 2 lions and the African savannah

Characters



Marion Vitale was born and raised in the slums of Naples, in a world where cruelty and poverty became her constant companions from an early age. She was the only child in a family where her parents struggled to survive, working odd jobs and scraping by every penny.

From a young age, Marion realized that the world she lived in would not be merciful to her. Faced with poverty and hopelessness, she lost faith in a brighter future early on.

However, as Marion reached puberty, she discovered that her beauty and charm could be her ticket to a world where money and power ruled everything. Influenced by circumstances and with no other options, Marion decided to use her gifts and began working in a local brothel.

Her refined appearance and unparalleled seduction skills caught the eye of Francesco Del Vecchio, the boss of the local mafia organization. Impressed by her beauty and grace, Francesco decided to invite Marion to work for him, offering her protection and high fees in exchange for her loyalty and obedience.

The bleak prospects and low chances of survival in the ruthless world of the mafia prompted Marion to accept Francesco's offer. Thus began her journey into the world of crime and debauchery, where she had to submit to the boss's will to survive in this dangerous world.

Eliza Montgomery was born into a life of privilege and wealth, the daughter of a prominent businessman in New York City. From a young age, she was accustomed to a life of luxury and extravagance, attending elite schools and socializing with the city's elite.

Despite her privileged upbringing, Eliza always felt like something was missing in her life. She longed for excitement and adventure, craving experiences that her sheltered existence could not provide.

As she grew older, Eliza rebelled against her family's expectations and sought out thrills in the seedy underbelly of the city. Drawn to the allure of the forbidden, she began exploring the world of high-end escorting, indulging in a lifestyle of excess and indulgence.

It was during one of her escapades that Eliza caught the attention of Francesco Del Vecchio, the enigmatic boss of a powerful mafia clan. Impressed by her beauty, sophistication, and fearless demeanor, Francesco offered Eliza a lucrative opportunity to work for him as one of his personal courtesans.

Torn between her desire for excitement and the dangerous world of organized crime, Eliza ultimately chose to accept Francesco's offer, trading in her life of privilege for a chance at adventure and power.

Isabelle Santiago grew up in the vibrant streets of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, surrounded by the rhythms of samba and the hustle and bustle of city life. Born into a family struggling to make ends meet, Isabelle learned early on the harsh realities of poverty and survival.

Determined to escape the cycle of poverty that plagued her family, Isabelle sought out opportunities to improve her circumstances. With her striking beauty and natural charm, she found work as a dancer in one of the city's nightclubs, where she quickly caught the eye of wealthy patrons.

But life in the fast lane came with its own set of challenges, and Isabelle soon found herself drawn into the world of high-end escorting, where she could command top dollar for her services. It was during one of her encounters with a wealthy client that Isabelle first crossed paths with Francesco Del Vecchio, the notorious boss of a powerful mafia clan.

Impressed by her beauty, grace, and street smarts, Francesco saw potential in Isabelle and offered her a position as one of his personal courtesans. Torn between her desire for financial security and the dangers of getting involved with organized crime, Isabelle ultimately chose to accept Francesco's offer, trading in her life of uncertainty for the promise of protection and prosperity.

Francesco Del Vecchio, the notorious boss of one of the largest Mafia clans in Sicily, had always been a man of unwavering authority and ruthless demeanor. From a young age, Francesco was groomed to inherit the family business, instilled with the values of loyalty, power, and control.

As he ascended the ranks of the Mafia hierarchy, Francesco earned a fearsome reputation for his iron-fisted rule and merciless tactics. His word was law, and those who dared to defy him faced swift and brutal consequences.

Despite his commanding presence, Francesco harbored a dark and insatiable appetite for dominance and pleasure. To satisfy his desires, he kept a tight leash on a select group of women who served as his personal courtesans and confidantes.

Among them were Marion, Eliza, and Isabelle, three women who had become fixtures in Francesco's inner circle. Each was chosen for her beauty, charm, and unwavering loyalty to the boss. But as Francesco's demands grew more depraved and his temper more volatile, the women found themselves trapped in a cycle of fear and servitude.

When Francesco summoned them to report on their performance, Marion, Eliza, and Isabelle knew that trouble was brewing. The prospect of facing Francesco's wrath filled them with dread, knowing all too well the consequences of disappointing the boss.

As they prepared to meet with Francesco, the women couldn't shake the feeling of impending doom that hung over them like a dark cloud. Little did they know that their encounter with the boss would set off a chain of events that would change their lives forever.

Features


  • Compelling Storyline: Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative set in the gritty underworld of the mafia, filled with realistic and intense scenes of violence.
  • Realistic Characters: Encounter a diverse cast of characters, each with their own background, motivations, and secrets.
  • Immersive Settings: Explore the depths of the mafia's hideout, where danger lurks around every corner, and experience the raw power and brutality of the African lion's den.
  • Intense Violence: Experience realistic scenes of violence and brutality, not suitable for the faint of heart.
  • Epic Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the game's atmosphere with an epic soundtrack that enhances every emotional moment.

highlighted.name: A new way to make money
You always wanted to be a movie star, didn't you?

content_descriptors.notes:
Please be advised that this game contains material that may cause discomfort or offense to some players. 'Blood, Sweat, and Lions' is intended for mature audiences and may include scenes of violence, extreme violence, sexual violence, drug/alcohol abuse, torture, nudity, executions, mutilation, consumption by wild animals and other themes that could be sensitive to certain individuals. We urge you to exercise caution when selecting this game and ensure it aligns with your personal preferences and tolerance for such content.
This game doesn't contains the following content: self-harm, suicide.

The characters shown in the game are all over 20 years old.

The developer holds full and exclusive rights to commercially utilize the aforementioned artworks provided by the artist, within the context of creating and distributing this game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Blood, Sweat, and Lions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on an exhilarating and ambitious adventure set in a world of crime, intrigue, and survival. "Blood, Sweat and Lions" presents an incredible story where three women find themselves at the heart of the underworld.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
